metadata.title: CVE-2022-29806 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - high
metadata.description:
ZoneMinder before 1.36.13 allows remote code execution via an invalidlanguage. Ability to create a debug log file at an arbitrary pathnamecontributes to exploitability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.36.32+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.36.32+dfsg1-1').
